note.snippet: Na vattabbaṃ – sabbaṃ kammaṃ savipāka’’nti? Āmantā. Nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatā – nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ appaṭisaṃviditvā byantibhāvaṃ vadāmi, tañca kho diṭṭheva dhamme upapajje
Diṭṭhisampanno puggalo satthari agāravoti? Āmantā. Diṭṭhisampanno puggalo buddhathūpe ohadeyya omutteyya niṭṭhubheyya buddhathūpe apabyāmato

Diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggatīti? Āmantā. Diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike sadde…pe… gandhe… rase… phoṭṭhabbe…pe… amanussitthiyā tiracchānagatitthiyā nāgakaññāya methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, ajeḷakaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya, kukkuṭasūkaraṃ paṭiggaṇheyya, hatthigavassavaḷavaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya… tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṃ

note.original: aṭṭhakathānulomaṃ paravādīpucchālakkhaṇaṃ. tathāpāyaṃ pucchā sakavādissa, purimāyo ca imissaṃ duggatikathāyaṃ paravādissāti gahetabbā viya dissanti
